com.aionemu.gameserver.restrictions
Class RestrictionsManager

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.restrictions.RestrictionsManager

public final class RestrictionsManager
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
lord_rex This class is a Manager for restrictions. This is a very useful system, you can use that for: game restrictions, events restrictions, quests restrictions, instances restrictions, customs restrictions.

isRestricted

public static boolean isRestricted(Player player,
                                   java.lang.Class<? extends Restrictions> callingRestriction)
This function can be used for activate one restriction. Example: public static boolean startAppleEatingEvent(Player player) { if(RestrictionsManager.isRestricted(player, AppleEatingEventRestriction.class)) return false; return true; }
